channel.title: Testing on Edd Mann
channel.description: Recent content in Testing on Edd Mann

item.title: Weeknotes: Throwaway Tools, Sessions as Trees, and Building a Personal AI Assistant
item.description: Week three. It’s been another busy week with work and spending any free time I do have with these LLMs, exploring many different things along the way.

item.title: Mince Pie Challenge: Adding Test Coverage using Jest and Travis CI
item.description: Following on from adding Flow to the API project, I now wish to garner further confidence in the code by adding tests. In this post I will document the process of setting up the test-runner Jest, and adding suitable test coverage to the current authentication example.
